website_summaries.verdict: A simple TPU case that enhances the feel of the Switch in portable mode.
pros: This thin TPU case greatly improves the comfort of portable mode and includes 8 rubber thumbstick caps
Allows for easy access to all buttons and ports, including the kickstand
cons: This case cover is more difficult to remove than most

website_summaries.verdict: A grip case that can provide a measure of protection to your Nintendo Switch while it makes your portable mode gaming more comfortable.
pros: Good tight fit on the device, but still easy to put on
Made from a stretchy, yet protective material
All buttons are accessible when this case is on your Nintendo Switch
cons: Can be hard to take off, which is what you will need to do to charge or dock your Nintendo Switch

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without it. So comfy.
customer_reviews.text: The switch is amazing. But let’s get real, in handheld mode, it is SOOOO uncomfortable. there’s no grips. it’s flat. This case provides grips like a controller and the material is floppy so it comes off easily. Now I actually enjoy playing in handheld mode much more. I got the black which is very nice. i highly recommend. Also it comes with multiple color thumb grips. Great deal! Matches my mario odyssey red switch
customer_reviews.author: EmpathLove

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Switch owner.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a must have soft case that not only protects your Nintendo Switch from scratches, but is incredibly comfortable. It is not dock friendly, but it does fit in carrying cases well. You wouldn't want this in a dock anyway. Also it's very screen protector friendly. The included thumbstick covers are also really nice and grippy. I would by again and highly recommend. This thing was so comfy, I didn't even realize I never docked my Switch the first month of owning it with this thing on.
customer_reviews.author: Nova

customer_reviews.title: Helps a bit with comfort
customer_reviews.text: Overall: I bought it to help with comfort and it does that a bit Pros: - Helps with comfort by adding something underneath to grip - Looks pretty nice Cons: - Really tight fit, so it's difficult to take it off (I thought I was going to snap off the joycon the first time) - Can't charge with the case on unless you use the cord directly (doesn't fit into the dock) - No way to access the kickstand while the case is on.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty nice case
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nice case! I bought it to use while in handheld mode and it works great. It goes on and off pretty easily and fits nice and snug. I wouldn't necessarily trust a high fall with my switch in this case, but like I said, I'm using the case as more of a grip while playing in handheld mode than as a protective case. For the price I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Rael

customer_reviews.title: ... for a grip for the switch this is the best one on the market at the moment
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a grip for the switch this is the best one on the market at the moment. It fits on there great, the joycons cannot wobble, the vents line up perfectly, it has a bit of nonslip grip to it. As a bonus it comes with a bunch of joystick nubs, so you can customize how your switch looks. It does not fit in the dock in this, but it does still fit in the nintendo brand cases (I have the sheika eye case). It makes holding the switch for hours a breeze and makes it a lot easier on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Buy if you dont care about these issues
customer_reviews.text: Overall its a decent product with a huge flaw. It is close to impossible to take this thing off. It is extremely hard to take it off, sometimes when i need it off i feel like i am ripping off the joy cons from the screen. Positives: Good protection feels good in hands. Negative: Very difficult to take off. the top part that covers the joy cons kinda slips down over the top instead of just sitting on the top to protect the joy cons, which is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: yar Law

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bigger Hands
customer_reviews.text: I got this item hoping that I could play my Switch for more than 30 minutes without my hands cramping. This works FANTASTIC! Comfortable grip and the joystick caps are very useful as well. I played for 2 hours and my hands weren't in pain. It is easy to take on and off if you want to use the Switch in docked mode as well. I highly recommend this if you struggled with using the Switch in handheld mode. Great price for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Good Case
customer_reviews.text: No problems with the case itself. Makes handheld mode much more comfortable with the grips. Easy to take off and put on. The extra joystick covers are a plus. Build quality is good for the price. My only problem is you can't dock it with the case on. If you could it would be 5/5. If you go between docking and handheld a lot this might be annoying to you.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: it's not horrible but it doesn't really slip on and off that ...
customer_reviews.text: Meh...it's not horrible but it doesn't really slip on and off that easily and the corners that go around the shoulder buttons feel flimsy enough that I might rip it. I knew going in that it wouldn't charge in the dock with this sleeve on it, but I guess I underestimated how lame that is. I likely won't use this very much even though holding the Switch by itself is even less comfortable. Disclaimer: I am not unhappy that I bought a Switch, but I am not overly blown away by it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to remove
customer_reviews.text: This case fits maybe a little too tight... It’s pretty difficult to get off without putting too much pressure on your joycons. I honestly don’t understand how other reviewers say it’s easily removable. I’ve only used this case a handful of times and I noticed one of my joycons wiggles slightly now. I wish it was easier to remove because I love the actual feel of this case and it is comfortable in your hands. I’m just disappointed and I feel like I’ve wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: So much more comfortable than holding it normally
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this because I had a 5 hour flight and I wanted to keep myself occupied, so I brought my switch. I played it 90% of the time docked, so I never really used it handheld, but it was not comfortable for my hands. This grip is much more comfortable to hold, and I see myself using my switch more now handheld than I did previously. More of a 50/50 split now.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, protective, little hard to remove
customer_reviews.text: I really love how this makes the Switch feel in your hands and the material/snugness make it seem like it will be well protected. My only complaint is that kids might have a hard time putting on/removing the case. I kind of know where you pry it off without bending any parts but kids may not. My son did an unofficial drop test on hardwood flooring (an accident) and I didn't noticed a scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Kent

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, damages controllers
customer_reviews.text: This damaged my switches controls, it left those marks all around both controls, sides, front, and back, i only just saw this when i was trying to remove the protector, do not buy, sadly these had a good grip for large hands but it came at a cost Really mad now because i bought 3 of these, recomended them to everyone i know and now i have to tell everyone these are bad
customer_reviews.author: joeyy

customer_reviews.title: Comfort = solved!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these cases, one for myself and one for my boyfriend. Totally worth it! The only problem I have with the Nintendo switch is that handheld mode is incredibly uncomfortable, and there is no grip. This case solved that problem for me! I play handheld much more now that I have this case. My hands no longer fall asleep while I play stardew valley for hours on end. This case reminds me of the comfort that the GameCube controller brought to the table. Pro: incredibly comfortable, grips are perfect size, case is easy to take on and off, affordable, came in 2 days with Prime Con: doesn’t fit in switch dock with case on (don’t force it!!)
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Miller

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that would make the Switch more comfortable to hold and use for longer periods of time, and without adding bulk. This protective sleeve is exactly what I was looking for. It doesn't seem to warp if you take it off and on repeatedly, which is nice. It doesn't get that weird greasy feeling some materials will get from fingerprints or sweat. Overall, good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saves my hands!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Switch to use exclusively as a handheld. I work two jobs and simply don’t have enough time to game on a TV anymore. The only drawback is the switch isn’t comfortable to hold for long stretches and this case solves that problem. I can’t speak to how well it protects as I’m not the type to drop my device, but it makes mobile gaming far more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable over longer periods of play
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The low profile of the case is great, it's not bulky It feels good in hand for short periods of play Comes with thumb grips Cons: Not very comfortable over longer periods of play
customer_reviews.author: Keyser RevealTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: A good value
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case and I feel it's a value for the protection. The only issue I have is the discomfort in my hands after playing games intensely. After a while my hands will feel cramped because it's still not holding a controller but it's still a nice product. BUT, it is still much more comfortable than having nothing on the Nintendo Switch.
customer_reviews.author: REDtoniX

customer_reviews.title: Great molded grip, bonus joystick covers
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the cover is perfect. It has a nice grip that the switch lacks by itself, and its surface is smooth but not slippery. It also has the spot open on the back for the kickstand, which is cut perfectly. A little bonus are the joystick covers! They actually improved the comfort and grip, so that was very cool of them to send 4 pairs in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: SunriseOnNewYears

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation and removal
customer_reviews.text: Gives much needed heft to the Nintendo Switch. Allows me to use it in handheld mode for extended periods of time with less strain. Protects the Switch and still fits inside the Zelda branded carrying case. Completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R. Franco

customer_reviews.title: Better for ergonomics. Snug fit.
customer_reviews.text: The grip on it is more ergonomic than without a case. It covers the Switch tight which is good because I am rough but it stays in place. Just a bit of caution. If you got sweaty hands like me. The case will get slippery. So you'll have to periodically wipe it.
customer_reviews.author: Mir Katz

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, very functional!
customer_reviews.text: This case fit great on the switch with the controllers attached for mobile mode. I bought it to protect my switch when I am playing it on the go or carrying it around the house and it works great! All the buttons are accessible and work fine with the case on. I'm very happy with the purchase, it exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Beth McGaughey

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely do not recommend this product. It's hard to get the switch out without worry about damaging the controllers. The fit is imperfect and edge of case's audio hole is too close to audio plugin.
customer_reviews.author: David Barker

customer_reviews.title: It adds a bit more of protection
customer_reviews.text: It isn't the strongest case but it does the job. I am usually playing in dock mode however I wanted to protect the switch when I play in handheld and this case does the job. Just watch out when putting it on and taking it off as I feel that if you're not carefull, it may damage the rails where the joycons attach to the switch (this is just an impression, nothing has really happened to mine)
customer_reviews.author: ADOLFO GUZMAN CORDERO

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Hard to Remove
customer_reviews.text: This fit my Switch perfectly, and provides a little extra bumper on the back that makes it easier to hold. It was also made of high quality plastic, which was honestly a surprise. However, it is somewhat difficult to remove it from the game system, and I'm worried I will break the controllers if I'm not extremely gentle when removing the case.
customer_reviews.author: Sarrah

customer_reviews.title: its really good!
customer_reviews.text: i really like this grip, the reviews really did it justice, the cost was not too bad. it fits perfectly and comfortably. i didnt make use of the button grips as much, other than that its a really great product! i would def recommend this to a friend if they wants a grip for their nintendo switch :)
customer_reviews.author: Sherwin L

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case; it's sturdy and very comfortable. Due to the low profile, this case fits inside the carry case I bought, where another case was just too big and bulky. This case makes the switch much more comfortable to hold for long playing sessions, fits in my case, and is good-looking to boot. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: 📚 Bookwyrm 📚Top Contributor: Brewing

customer_reviews.title: It worked perfectly, but...
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfectly, but my kids don't like it, they said that is difficult to take the switch in and out on it, when they have to put it in the dock. But for traveling is very useful and the most important, the switch is secured.
customer_reviews.author: Efrain

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Great feel to it..and well made. But the fit is just the littlest off on the right top side. So I'm taking a point. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Gil81

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: It makes holding the switch more comfortable, however you won't be able to put in the dock and it's kind of a pain at times to get it off without possibly damaging the joy-cons.
customer_reviews.author: Shendowx

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it’ll still fit in cases!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by just how great this feels in-hand. Truly improves the gameplay experience. Though I would HIGHLY recommend other, concave analog stick caps, as all three included sets still have the same convex shape.
customer_reviews.author: tyson herchak

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect! It came on time
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect! It came on time, I got the black. It was packaged very nicely! One thing I do not like about it is, it’s super hard to get off. It feels like I’m going pop off one my joy cons. But I bought an extender for my dock, it solved my problem no more having to take the case off. It’s an amazing case It feels nice in the hand doesn’t add too much weight. It’s just difficult to take it off. Good job.
customer_reviews.author: Jebadiah Rose

customer_reviews.title: Feels great. Looks cool.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice case. Looks cool. The main thing is... Is it comfortable? Yes. I went to work without it once and was legit upset. It gives you the impression of holding a controller which I believe is the purpose. It also fits in my carrying case which is great. As for protection... Everything not exposed should be just fine if dropped. I was going to rate 4 stars because you cant have the case on the switch while docked... But thats just silly.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that the seller is awesome. They contacted me days after I received my protector but unfortunately I was not able to comment since this was a Christmas gift. It was easy the install and I really like TPU cases. I would definitely recommend this case. It offers some protection and is flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Chochy

customer_reviews.title: comfy for biger hands
customer_reviews.text: I've been addicted to enter the gungeon lately and it's been killing my hands. I didn't think this would do as much as it did to keep my hands comfortable. Instead of having a centimeter of plastic digging into the side of your palm it feels like a large heavy xbox controller.
customer_reviews.author: Not Chad Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable case to hold and looks right at home on the switch
customer_reviews.text: Good case if you dont take controllers off a lot or use it in the dock. It fits well, therefore it doesnt lend itself to popping it off alot to put it in the dock or remove the controllers easily. The case makes the switch easier to hold and will protect it from small drops.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes Handheld Mode much better.
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction and easy to take on and off. I can still feel the rumble through the case and it makes the system much more comfortable to hold over long periods of time. Not to mention the fact that it really makes the system much more stable when using the kickstand. I just wish the thumbstick covers were a bit more grippy for my sweaty hands. However the case itself is great.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: HUGE improvement in the handling of the console. Pink/ring ...
customer_reviews.text: HUGE improvement in the handling of the console. Pink/ring fingers would cramp up within minutes because they had nothing to hold onto. Now the ergonomics is greatly improve. Not 100% as the bump out could still be a little larger and angled out. But for the price this thing is well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Zach L.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but great
customer_reviews.text: The TPU case actually harder then expected therefore is not flimsy. The corners on the front of the Joy-cons bug me though as they don't go around as nicely I hoped. BEWARE WHEN REMOVING THE CASE. As I've said, the case is pretty tough. Hence, removing is pretty tough. You may end damaging the Joy-cons by pushing too hard onto them when trying to remove the case. Be careful as my Joy-cons are now a bit shaky. Overall, I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Noor Ashamdi

customer_reviews.title: Questionable material choices, decent shaping
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure about the durability of the case but it doesn’t inspire confidence. What I’m certain of is that I’m not fond about the feel or the fitting of the case: it is slick and shiny outside, and doesn’t fit snugly on the switch. It does have a nice grip shape.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Mesler

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, ergonomic, great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. I wanted to protect my AC Switch. This case makes it much more ergonomic and comfortable to hold. It’s kind of a soft plastic, feels grippy and smooth. Came with those joystick grips, that i wanted anyway. Definitely happy with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Benton

customer_reviews.title: Gives much needed grip
customer_reviews.text: Gives the grip needed so I don't feel like it's going to slip out of my hand at any second as well as a comfortable fit. Fairly simple to take off and on as needed to use in docked mode.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. Good quality plastic, has nice gummy feel that probably gives it good bounce and absorbs energy if the console falls onto the ground. Easy to get case on or off while maintaining sturdy attachment when it is on the console. The best part is that it adds ergonomic handles on the backside of the joycon controllers, making the console much easier to grasp during play.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, perfectly portable.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so nice. Best $14 I've spent for my Switch! The Switch with this on it still fits my little slingbag perfectly, and definitely helps play games in handheld. I used to have this kinda bulky, 3D printed handgrip from thingiverse, but usually left that at home because I always had to carry it separately. This is the perfect compromise between portability, and added grip. Yup, the fit is tight, but that just makes it feel much more secure. And the included thumbgrips are a nice plus. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Michael V.

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my 5 year old niece. It works perfectly on her Switch. She is able to hold on to the Switch easily and it gives her dad piece of mind that she won't break it if she drops it.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Good fitment, easy to clean, feels good
customer_reviews.text: Really good in eliminating cramps and pinky falling asleep while playing laying down or in bed. A little getting use to if you have bigger hands but my girl it tiny and she say it feel perfect, not too aggressive on the joycon grip
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great investment! I bought one for myself because my "wonderful" ex-cat jumped up onto my furniture and dropped my whole platform to the floor at about 4AM. My right joycon couldn't stay in place so now with the case it stay on instead of sliding off. I also bought another one as a gift for my bf and he loves it too! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: amanda saez

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect if not for 1 slight inconvenience.
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and protective but can be a little hard to take off. It won’t allow the switch to charge in its case with this on. Have to either take this off or unplug the switch cord from the case and plug it directly into the switch itself. Slight inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: OEVFORCE

customer_reviews.title: A must for comfort and ergonomics
customer_reviews.text: A must for comfort and ergonomics. I really love it. Simple accessory and yet, it improves the overall experience when playing handheld mode wit your switch.
customer_reviews.author: MauriciohzCom

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Can't give it 5 stars because I haven't had it for that long yet, but so far it's been exactly what I've been looking for. My joy con controller lock switches broke so they slide off my switch without pressing in the lock switch, but this case does a great job of keeping them locked in. Nice soft rubber feel to it, and the analog stick protectors are a nice addition and stay on nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Davenport

customer_reviews.title: not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: good case for the price the cut is fit and no button blocking. easy to hold and help with scratching the back of it. only thing is the smell of the rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Stan C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Case, Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm buying this again because I wanted to change the color from the red one I already have and love.
customer_reviews.author: Teddi.Ursine

customer_reviews.title: Very fast ship, Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was for my son. He wanted something that wouldn't make his hands hurt. This is softer so it is easier to hold for long periods of time. He really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and great quality! Our last was a hard plastic and cracked fast and was a pain to take on and off so this was a great buy and so much easier to take on and off!
customer_reviews.author: YagerBombMom

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS GREAT BUT HARD TO GET OFF FOR DOCKING IT TO ...
customer_reviews.text: IT WORKS GREAT BUT HARD TO GET OFF FOR DOCKING IT TO CHARGE . I WISH IT FIT IN DOCK WITHOUT HAVING TO TAKE IT OFF
customer_reviews.author: bcingu

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice addition for my Nintendo switch. I love how comfortable it feels in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Gift worthy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to hold. Non slip when I set it down. Fits very well.
customer_reviews.author: Melody F

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice case, but a little uncomfortable to take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and makes me feel less nervous about dropping the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Britt WT

customer_reviews.title: Great TPU case
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is it doesn't fit in the dock but I didn't want it overheating in there anyway. Simple solution with a usb c extender.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Allen

customer_reviews.title: Does its job!
customer_reviews.text: It does its job very well by giving an extra grip to the nintendo switch, just wish it was softer and that ot could fit in the dock.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Guzman

customer_reviews.title: comfortable to hold, good case!
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape of this case with the grips for your hands, it makes to 10x easier to hold my Switch!! It's a soft and comfortable material to hold, too. No slipping. The little thumbstick covers work well and they'll definitely protect the sticks well -- just be aware that they do add a little bulk, and I've found it a little harder to press the - button with them on, if you decide to use them. Great product! 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these. One for my wife and one for myself. They are perfect and protective. The only downside is it’s a little bulky near the grips so it’s hard to fit it in our case but besides that I’d recommend this for switch owner.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Wilson

customer_reviews.title: i liked it
customer_reviews.text: easy to put on easy to remove, is flexible and durable as well definitely would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Orelbi

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It would’ve been the best if it had the option to charge the Nintendo switch with the case still on. Other than that it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: M K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Makes it more comfortable to play. Eliminates the problem of the joycons wobbling slightly.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Good Case, Hard to Take off
customer_reviews.text: Its easiest to put the to in first, but the case works well.
customer_reviews.author: N. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Superb comfort and decent protection
customer_reviews.text: Great case with amazing comfort added by the palm support. Easy to on and off. A must have for handheld players!
customer_reviews.author: Pete Giron

customer_reviews.title: So good I bought another one for my Niece
customer_reviews.text: This is about as perfect a case for the price as there can be. It's a bit tough to get on the first time but it fits snug and the added grips on the back are great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Shabba

customer_reviews.title: Its looks like you have good controller combined on ur switch
customer_reviews.text: Its a must for playing on switch ! Its comfortable to hold No more pain to ur wrist
customer_reviews.author: MAJED ALRASHEEDI

customer_reviews.title: Makes the switch experience better.
customer_reviews.text: I used to get hand pain whenever I played on my switch in handheld mode for longer periods. This grip makes it easier to hold and it puts less stress on my hands. The only downside is that you have to remove it to dock the switch, but its super easy to take off/put back in.
customer_reviews.author: raze

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, feels like a Wii U gamepad
customer_reviews.text: I saw on a review that this felt like a Wii U gamepad and I can report that it does. Great fit. Pretty easy to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: R. G.

customer_reviews.title: I loved it !
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Easy to remove and really nice to hold and won’t get in the way of the controls. It’s really an amazing case !!!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge L.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic grip
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this more than 5 stars, I would. This case is a must have. I’m 6’2. I have big hands. The size of the switch feels weird without a good hold (for me).This case solved that feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Case.
customer_reviews.text: Great case for my Switch! very easy to put on and remove, love the grips behind the Joy-Cons, fits perfectly in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Roy S.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, functional and durable
customer_reviews.text: The cover case is exactlt what i have been lookig for my son's switch. It's soft enough that I can easily take the nintendo off but at thensame time it is snuggly fit when on it. For the price I would highly recommend and I will never look for more....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this case
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this case, easy to take on and off to charge! My kids really like it and the company has great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: MUCH more comfortable than original grip
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how much these could have helped until one of my friends that I needed to pick these up if I was going to use the handheld much. It is a night and day difference how much better it feels with this cover on it.
customer_reviews.author: Socbob

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: The product make it so much easier to hold the switch. And it's easy to put on a take off.
customer_reviews.author: kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Fits it perfectly and even has a space to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits it perfectly and even has a space to put the stand up on the back. Only problem is it doesn’t fit on its charging/display box that hooks up to the tv. But it’s not that big of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great! Makes the switch playable in handheld.
customer_reviews.text: Great! Makes the switch playable in handheld. This should have came with the system. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: RNW

customer_reviews.title: Necessity
customer_reviews.text: Could be a little easier to put on and take off but that’s not a major issue, it makes the switch easier to hold if you have big hands like myself. It adds extra protection and saved my switch from a few bruises
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and seller was YCCTEAM
customer_reviews.text: The seller, YCCTEAM, sent the product out fast. The item fits perfectly and makes the grip better. The little analog pads work well. Easy to interchange them. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits my travel case
customer_reviews.text: It makes the switch easier to hold. It also fits into the travel case that I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: K Wharton

customer_reviews.title: It fit perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This was s gift for my grandson for his Nintendo Switch. He’s using it therefore he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It fit good and it also helps to hold the switch better
customer_reviews.author: Keischa

customer_reviews.title: Great if you use it
customer_reviews.text: Great if you use it. If you're not a road worrier it'll sit around and not get used. Knobs are a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden's

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: only complaint is that its a bit of a hassle to take off and put back on when you want to separate the joycon for on the go 2 player games. Otherwise, I keep it on all the time, and its a huge improvement in comfort over using the standard switch in handheld mode without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case at excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent case, very satisfied with how easy it goes on and off, the protection it provides and the way it feels when holding.
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew and he loved the feel of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Good Case, Good Seller
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time in perfect condition. The case can be removed to put the switch in the dock relatively easily. Might be difficult for younger children. Case feels sturdy. Definitely adds some comfort when playing for long sessions. I also have a travel case that the switch still fits in with this case on.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Gehweiler

customer_reviews.title: Great value, can’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: Case is comfortable to hold and use during play! It’s a bit of a hassle to take on and off during 2 player mode, but I mostly play in portable so that’s fine. Case is easy to get on and off, and I like the look of it (I went with the black color). Overall, 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: It really does protect the switch. We have tile floors and switch is still good
customer_reviews.author: Verito

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I love it it is super easy to take on and off when trying to dock it and it has great grip. Very comfortable to play with I will never not own one.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew dant

customer_reviews.title: High quality, comfortable, durable case
customer_reviews.text: The case is is high quality, comfortable, easy to put on and take off and I can access everything with the case on. It's an excellent case. My only wish is that it came with more black rubber tops for the joycon joysticks but definitely not a deal breaker in any sense.
customer_reviews.author: Ichajubi

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to place. Had a little issue removing it. Firm grip for the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! It keeps my switch protected without adding any bulk to the system. It comes off easily and slips on just as fast. It's also compatible with the carrying case I purchased to take my switch wherever I go. Definitely a great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great case with firm comfortable grips
customer_reviews.text: Love the grips I used to get hand cramps trying to play in portable mode but this case fixes that problem and now I play in portable mode every chance I get. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and is a very quality product. Feels great in the hands.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley & Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great case for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very much like this case makes it much easier to play in hand held. I don’t think it’s that easy to take off or put on but it’s not as complicated as others so I make it work. Overall for the price worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Wilburn

product_meta.title: YCCTEAM Protective Case Cover for Nintendo Switch, Comfortable Soft TPU Grip Case and Ergonomic Anti-Scratch Shock-Absorption Cover for Nintendo Switch 2017 with 8 Thumb Grips Caps - Black
product_meta.description:
Introducing YCCTEAM cover case for Nintendo Switch 

 * The case for Nintendo Switch is constructed of a hybrid combination of soft, shock-absorbent TPU and damage-resistant material, gives you comfortable feelings and will not scratch the switch
 * Easily fits on and off the Switch. Comfortable and makes you feel better about your console being protected though
 *  There is a slight bezel around the whole edge of the Switch, with this case covering the back and your screen protector plus joystick covers(8 thumb stick caps included) on front your console is pretty well protected.
 * Package Contents: 1 x Cover Case for Nintendo Switch, 8 x Thumb stick caps

Note : The switch console won't fit in the dock with this cover installed, you gotta take it off to dock the switch. It's pretty easy to get on and off though.(Not include Switch)
feature_bullets: COMFORTABLE IN HANDS - It is constructed of a hybrid combination of soft, shock-absorbent high quality TPU and damage-resistant material, gives you comfortable feelings for playing in handheld mode

EASY TO PUT ON AND TAKE OFF - It's very easy to put on and take off for whenever you want dock the switch. Must have product if you playing handheld mode, the feel of the Switch in your hands is enhanced with the grips on this case for Nintendo Switch.

PERFECT PROTECTION - CE/FCC/ROHS Certificates. The protective case for Nintendo Switch can protect your device from everyday bumps, drops, shocks, scratches, dust and fingerprints. It's the perfect balance of flexibility and ridigity to make it protective and comfortable while fitting very well.
NOTE - It's one whole piece, like many covers for Nintendo Switch, you gotta take it off to dock the switch. It's pretty easy to get on and off though.
If you have any question, please have no hesitate to contact with us, all messages would be replied within 24 hours.
